casebody.data:
99-0483 (La. 4/1/99)

Mack RICHARDSON v. STATE of Louisiana, et al. No. 99-C-0483. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: State of Louisiana Et Al; Huey P. Long Hospital; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Rapides 9th Judicial District Court Div. “F” Number 181,023; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-0918

Denied.

VICTORY and TRAYLOR, JJ. would grant the writ. KNOLL, J. not on panel.
